items.name: Life Crystal
items.description: Binds a deceased creature's sould to a mortal construct
items.flavor: "Reviving deceased players may only be done by a town magician."

items.name: Kjellberg
items.description:
Stats:
- 10 HP 
- 2 ATK 

Players adjacent to Kjellberg contract the "{red}RETARDATION{/}" debuff causing -5 INT 

 * Can not be resummoned if Kjellberg dies.
